text: Di hagabuulinga dangada hagatau gu tenetene huoloo gi di hai o digau agoago hagau ne haga modongoohia. Digaula gu hilihili Stephen, taane dela e honu i di hagadonu mo di Hagataalunga Dabu, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas mo Nicolaus tangada tuadimee mai Antioch dela ne huli guu hai tangada daumaha o Jew.
